mapper.select: select id, title, logo, uri, key_word, contacts, tel, phone, fax, qq, email, site, content from settings where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into settings ( id, title, logo, uri, key_word, contacts, tel, phone, fax, qq, email, site, content ) values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{logo}, #{uri}, #{keyWord}, #{contacts}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{site}, #{content} )
